articles.description: Donte Ingram scored eight of his 17 points down the stretch and Aundre Jackson finished with 15 points to help Loyola-Chicago beat Indiana State 75-71 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Ingram, Jackson lead Loyola-Chicago past Indiana St., 75-71

articles.description: Isaiah Reese scored 13 points, pulled down 10 rebounds and dished out seven assists and Malik Johnson added eight free throws down the stretch to lead Canisius to its fourth straight win, a 71-64 victory over Quinnipiac on Saturday afternoon.
articles.headline: Reese leads Canisius to 71-64 win over Quinnipiac

articles.description: Eric Parrish scored 21 points and grabbed nine rebounds and Akron downed Central Michigan 69-63 on Saturday, snapping a four-game skid.
articles.headline: Parrish leads as Akron downs Central Michigan 69-63

articles.description: Ky Bowman stole a rebound under the basket, drew a foul and hit two free throws with 2.9 seconds left on Saturday as Boston College scored the last nine points of the game to rally for a 72-70 victory over No. 25 Miami.
articles.headline: BC rallies late to topple No. 25 Miami 72-70

images.caption: BC's Steffon Mitchell denies Lonnie Walker IV which leads to Ky Bowman being fouled on the ensuing breakaway.
images.name: Mitchell's crucial block helps tie game

articles.description: The Bears win their third straight game with an 80-64 victory over the Jayhawks.
articles.headline: No. 10 Kansas upset by Baylor

images.caption: The Bears win their third straight game with an 80-64 victory over the Jayhawks.
images.name: No. 10 Kansas upset by Baylor

articles.description: Manu Lecomte scored eight straight points for Baylor after No. 10 and Big 12 co-leader Kansas had pulled within a basket, and the senior guard finished with 18 overall in the Bears' 80-64 upset victory Saturday.
articles.headline: Baylor pulls off 80-64 upset over No. 10 Kansas

images.caption: The Bears win their third straight game with an 80-64 victory over the Jayhawks.
images.name: No. 10 Kansas upset by Baylor
